instructions.1: In a small bowl combine the warm honey, mustard and nutmeg and mix until well blended. Smear onto the chicken pieces, coating well. Refrigerated and let sit for 1/2 hour.
instructions.2: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
instructions.3: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until done and chicken juices run clear. You can also grill or broil for 30 minutes, turning chicken pieces after 15 minutes of cooking.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the oven from Step 2 being used?
Is oven from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is warm honey from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 2, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 3?
Can we preheat (Step 2) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
